name: Image_804cib804cib804c

metadata.title: Nàng thơ mộng mơ tím lịm
metadata.description: Concept nàng thơ mộng mơ tím lịm bao nàng mơ ước

content: A hyper-realistic, photorealistic portrait of a beautiful young East Asian woman in her late teens, preserving her delicate facial features and captivating expression. She has fair skin and her hair is same uploaded picture with small purple flower clips. She wears an exquisite off-the-shoulder lavender layered tulle gown with sheer puffy sleeves, cinched at the waist with a dark purple belt featuring a silver buckle. Her accessories include elegant pearl drop earrings, a dazzling silver and purple gemstone necklace, and a stylish purple wrist watch. She gently cups her hands, holding a vibrant purple butterfly as if in a magical moment. The background is a dreamy, soft pink-to-lavender gradient, with lush green ivy vines and tiny purple flowers gracefully hanging, creating an ethereal and whimsical atmosphere. Soft, diffused, and angelic lighting illuminates the scene, highlighting intricate details and natural textures with stunning clarity. Medium shot, shallow depth of field, cinematic quality, captured in a 9:16 aspect ratio.

name: Image_hwj2trhwj2trhwj2

metadata.title: Nàng thơ mộng mơ tím lịm
metadata.description: Concept nàng thơ mộng mơ tím lịm bao nàng mơ ước

content: An ultra-photorealistic and cinematic, full-frame vertical portrait of a young East Asian woman, exquisitely detailed, preserving her delicate facial features. She exudes a serene and elegant aura, with a gentle, dream-like expression as she gazes softly to the side. Her hair is same uploaded pictured with delicate small purple blossoms. A magnificent silver and amethyst jeweled tiara crowns her head, sparkling with brilliance. She is adorned in a breathtaking off-shoulder gown crafted from layered, flowing purple tulle, featuring delicate sheer ruffled sleeves and a voluminous, ethereal skirt. Complementing her attire, she wears elegant pearl drop earrings, a striking silver and purple gemstone necklace, and a stylish purple wristwatch. In her left hand, she gracefully holds a vibrant purple rose with a matching purple butterfly perched on it, along with a branch of small yellow osmanthus flowers. The background is a beautifully blurred, ethereal landscape of soft lavender and rosy pink gradients, with two purple butterflies gracefully fluttering and delicate green ivy vines cascading on the right side. The scene is bathed in soft, diffused, magical golden hour lighting, highlighting intricate textures and details, creating a dreamlike ambiance with a shallow depth of field, 9:16 aspect ratio.

name: Image_q994wjq994wjq994

metadata.title: Nàng thơ mộng mơ tím lịm
metadata.description: Concept nàng thơ mộng mơ tím lịm bao nàng mơ ước

content: A hyper-realistic, photorealistic, cinematic medium close-up shot of a beautiful young woman, preserving her delicate facial features and serene expression. She has fair, smooth skin, soft rosy lips, and a gentle, dreamy gaze looking slightly upwards. Her hair is same uploaded picture. She wears an exquisite, off-the-shoulder purple ball gown, crafted from shimmering tulle or chiffon, sparkling with subtle glitter. The dress features elegant ruffled details around the shoulders. She is adorned with a pearl necklace featuring a large, radiant purple teardrop pendant, matching pearl drop earrings, and a sparkling silver tiara embellished with purple gemstones. A delicate purple butterfly rests on her raised right hand, and another on her left shoulder. Her right hand is elegantly lifted, gently interacting with the butterfly. The scene is bathed in soft, diffused, ethereal lighting, creating a gentle glow and a dreamlike ambiance. The background is a softly blurred, light purple sky, adorned with scattered luminous white star-shaped bokeh lights and delicate green ivy vines hanging from above. Shallow depth of field, cinematic quality, 9:16 aspect ratio. Giữ nguyên khuôn mặt ảnh gốc

name: Image_ty9wavty9wavty9w

metadata.title: Nàng thơ mộng mơ tím lịm
metadata.description: Concept nàng thơ mộng mơ tím lịm bao nàng mơ ước

content: A hyper-realistic, photorealistic, and cinematic portrait of a young East Asian woman in her early twenties, embodying a gentle and ethereal aura. Her face is serene and beautiful, with same upload picture smile, preserving facial features. She has luminous fair skin, expressive dark eyes, and full lips. Her hair same uploaded photo, adorned with small purple floral accents. She wears an elegant off-shoulder lavender tulle gown with flowing, sheer sleeves and a layered skirt, cinched at the waist by a wide, darker purple belt with a prominent silver buckle. Accessories include pearl drop earrings, a stunning purple and silver gemstone necklace with a central teardrop pendant, and a purple wrist watch. She gently cups her hands, holding a vibrant, shimmering purple butterfly. The lighting is soft and diffused, with a subtle cinematic glow, highlighting her features and the delicate textures of her dress. The background features a dreamy gradient of soft purple and pink, adorned with hanging green vines and tiny purple blossoms, creating a whimsical, garden-like setting. Shot at eye-level with a shallow depth of field, focusing sharply on the woman and the butterfly, achieving an extremely detailed and lifelike image with clear textures.

name: Image_uhm5nmuhm5nmuhm5

metadata.title: Nàng thơ mộng mơ tím lịm
metadata.description: Concept nàng thơ mộng mơ tím lịm bao nàng mơ ước

content: A hyper-realistic, cinematic portrait of a young East Asian woman, preserving her distinct facial features, with a serene and dreamy expression as she gazes upwards. Her hair is same uploaded picture with small purple wisteria flowers. She wears an exquisite, off-the-shoulder lavender gown made of shimmering, layered tulle with ruffled sleeves, capturing intricate fabric textures. Soft, ethereal lighting illuminates her, creating a gentle glow on her flawless skin and the delicate ruffles of her dress. She accessorizes with pearl drop earrings, a prominent purple beaded necklace featuring a large teardrop pendant, and a matching purple watch. Two vibrant purple butterflies add a magical touch, one resting gently on her cheek and another on her shoulder. The background is a soft-focus, enchanted garden with cascading purple wisteria blooms and green foliage against a gradient of pastel pink and lavender sky. A medium close-up shot with a shallow depth of field, presented in a vertical 9:16 aspect ratio.

name: Image_50ai3650ai3650ai

metadata.title: Sen hồng
metadata.description: Ảnh thiếu nữ trong trang phục áo dài ren trắng trên thuyền trong đầm sen

content:
anph21 (khuôn mặt dựa trên ảnh tham khảo). Đảm bảo khuôn mặt vẫn nhất quán 100% với người trong ảnh đã tải lên, không thay đổi cấu trúc khuôn mặt, mắt, mũi, miệng, tông màu da hoặc kiểu tóc. Chất lượng ảnh 8k. Cinematic realism. Độ chân thực đẳng cấp chuyên nghiệp và chi tiết, màu sắc rực rỡ, chủ thể được lấy nét sắc nét, độ phân giải 8K, tỷ lệ khung hình 9:16. Tạo cho tôi ảnh với miêu tả như sau.
Một bức ảnh góc cao nhìn xuống một phụ nữ trẻ người Việt Nam duyên dáng đang mỉm cười nhẹ trong khi 2 tay đang cầm nâng niu 1 chiếc đèn hoa đăng làm hình hoa sen và đang cúi mình thả nó vào trong nước . Cô ấy ngồi trên một chiếc thuyền nhỏ bằng gỗ được bao quanh bởi một ao sen dày đặc vào ban đêm. Cô ấy mặc chiếc áo dài (ÁO DÀI) trắng bằng vải ren mềm mại Cô ấy đang cầm một bông hoa sen màu hồng đang nở rộ. Bố cục cho thấy cô ấy nép mình giữa những chiếc lá sen lớn màu xanh lá cây, những giọt nước, và vô số hoa và nụ sen màu hồng và trắng trong nước tối, phản chiếu. Những tia sáng ấn tượng từ trên cùng bên phải chiếu sáng cô ấy và những tán lá xung quanh, tạo ra những cái bóng dài. Mặt nước phản chiếu ánh sáng. Sương mù, nền tối không khí. Góc máy ảnh được nâng lên, hiển thị rõ ràng kết cấu của lá và nước. --ar 9:16 --v 6.0 --style raw. 
Cô sở hữu làn da trắng sứ hoàn hảo, đôi má ửng hồng nổi bật, đôi môi hồng đào bóng bẩy, đôi mắt to, phấn mắt màu hồng đất được tô điểm bằng đường kẻ mắt mảnh và hàng mi cong vút.
Thêm một hình mờ nhỏ viết tay có nội dung ‘Prompt by: anph21’. Sử dụng phông chữ viết tay đẹp, nét mảnh, độ trong suốt trung bình, đặt ở góc dưới bên phải.
